Module: (Room / Booking / Payment / Users)

Description:
Add a room availability calendar or Enable payment receipt generation.

Why is this needed?
A room availability calendar will help staff quickly see which rooms are free and reduce double bookings.

Expected Outcome:
Staff can view room availability by date and time, and make bookings without conflicts."

Include any mockups, screenshots, links to references, or additional notes.
